p: All of the (AJ) EO’s antioxidant, antimicrobial, antilipase, cytotoxicity, COX, -amylase, and -glucosidase assays were carried out in triplicate, and the results were presented as means ± SD. Differences were considered to be significant when p values were lower than 0.05. The SPSS program, Version 22.0 for Windows was used for all statistical analyses (IBM SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA).
